paragraphs: The legendary Verka Serduchka will give a charity concert in Prague. It will take place on October 21 (Tuesday) at the Forum Karlín venue.
Tickets can be purchased through Ticketportal and Ticketmaster networks (names are clickable).
Part of the proceeds from the concert will go to help residents of Ukraine affected by the war.
The concert was originally scheduled for March 16, but due to technical reasons, it had to be rescheduled for the fall. All purchased tickets remain valid.

VERKA SERDUCHKA & band will arrive in full lineup, and not a single person will sit still. It's an explosive mix of universally beloved hits, humor, and stunning live performance. That's why for over 30 years the artist has been playing to sold-out crowds in the most prestigious halls and arenas around the world.

Let me remind you that the last time Verka Serduchka performed in Prague was in November 2022, gathering a full house at the grand concert hall "Lucerna". That's why this time the organizers have chosen a more spacious venue.
